name: Disco Dwarf
description:
You are running a futuristic bar.
Pour drinks to customers and clean up after them to maintain a high level of satisfaction. If the happiness bar drops to zero - you lose
If u survive the night, you win.

There is one but, you are a roller skating dwarf and you have to act to the beat of the music. Good luck!

Controls:

WASD - Character Movement

J - Interact

K - Switch arms
